localizedText.DESC_USERS: Contains the information about all managed user accounts.
localizedText.USER_MANAGEMENT_COMMAND_FAILED: User value could not be changed
localizedText.USERMANAGEMENT_PASSWORD_CHANGE_REQUESTED: The user has to change the password at the next login
localizedText.DESC_USERMANAGEMENT_FORCE_PASSWORD_CHANG: Force password change at next login
localizedText.USERMANAGEMENT_CONFIRM_DELETE_USER: Please confirm that you wish to delete the user
localizedText.DESC_PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH: The minimum length of passwords a user can choose.
localizedText.DESC_PASSWORD_ENABLE_AGING: If enabled the user has to choose a new password after the given timespan.
localizedText.DESC_PASSWORD_MAXIMUM_AGE: The period in which a user has to change the password.
localizedText.DESC_PASSWORD_BLACKLIST: A blacklist of passwords users cannot choose. One password per line.
localizedText.DESC_PASSWORD_FORCE_COMPLEX: According to GMP rules, a password must contain at least one uppercase character, lowercase character, special character, and numeric character.
localizedText.DESC_PASSWORD_HISTORY_SIZE: The number of previous passwords to remember. Users cannot reuse any of their last N passwords. Set to 0 to disable password history.
localizedText.DESC_MAX_INVALID_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS: Maximum number of consecutive invalid login attempts allowed. The user will be disabled after reaching this limit. Set to 0 to disable the lockout.
localizedText.DESC_EXCLUDE_SYSTEM_ADMINISTRATOR_FROM_L: Keep the __SystemAdministrator account enabled even after exceeding the maximum number of invalid login attempts.
localizedText.MAX_INVALID_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS: Invalid login attempts before disabling user
localizedText.RULE_CONTAINS_UPPERCASE_CHARACTER: The password must contain at least one uppercase character
localizedText.RULE_CONTAINS_LOWERCASE_CHARACTER: The password must contain at least one lowercase character
localizedText.RULE_CONTAINS_DIGIT: The password must contain at least one numeric character
localizedText.RULE_CONTAINS_PUNCTUATION_CHARACTER: The password must contain at least one special character
localizedText.RULE_MINIMUM_LENGTH: The password must consist of at least {0} characters
localizedText.DESC_USERMANAGEMENT_RESET_2FA: User must reconfigure 2FA at the next login
localizedText.USERMANAGEMENT_2FA_RESET_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to reset the user's 2FA configuration? This action cannot be undone.
localizedText.DESC_ENABLE_TWO_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION: Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) with Time-Based One-Time Passwords (TOTPs). Users will be required to set up 2FA during their next login.
localizedText.2FA_NOT_AVAILABLE: Two-Factor Authentication is not available for this user
localizedText.2FA_CONFIGURED: Two-Factor Authentication is already set up
localizedText.DISABLE_2FA_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to deactivate Two-Factor Authentication?
localizedText.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown error, please try again later
localizedText.MSG_USER_LOCKED_AFTER_FAILED_LOGINS: Disabled user '{0}' after {1} invalid login attempts (limit {2})
localizedText.MSG_USER_LOCK_FAILED_AFTER_FAILED_LOGINS: Failed to disable user '{0}' after {1} invalid login attempts (limit {2}). Error: {3}
